sub_title: PhD-candidate (external) Leiden University & TU Delft | Communitymanager Education CLARIAH HuC KNAW
summary: As an art historian, I've been dedicated to technical art history, the crossroads between modern technology and material/visual/living culture and the perception of art. I'm currently working on a collaboration between Leiden University and Delft University of Technology in researching the significance of 3D printing for (technical) art historical research and the conservation & presentation of paintings.
